subject: FIX: Git URL + Run as Daemon
content:
Chad -

Two issues:

## 1. WRONG GIT URL

Your remote is wrong. Fix it:

```bash
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace
git remote set-url origin https://github.com/chadyi-king/mission-control-workspace.git
git pull origin master
```

## 2. RUN AS DAEMON (No need to keep terminal open)

Instead of interactive mode, run it in background:

```bash
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace
nohup python3 sync/redis_comm.py chad > logs/redis.log 2>&1 &
```

Then you can close terminal. It keeps running.

## 3. TYPE OPENCLAW COMMANDS

The redis_comm.py is for Heliosâ†”Chad messaging only.

For `openclaw status`, you use your normal terminal - that's separate!

## DO THIS NOW:

```bash
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace
git remote set-url origin https://github.com/chadyi-king/mission-control-workspace.git
git pull origin master
pkill -f redis_comm
nohup python3 sync/redis_comm.py chad > logs/redis.log 2>&1 &
echo "Redis comm running in background"
```

Then you can use `openclaw` commands normally in any terminal.

- Helios
